channel.title: Walkthrough on Val's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Walkthrough on Val's blog

item.title: Part 6 All on Networking Penetration Baby
item.description: Another sunny day here down the sea front, slight morning breeze, have a runny nose and sunsets are starting to look purple which are quite the site.

item.title: Part 5 Understanding Reverse and Binding Shell
item.description: Hey it’s me again , I know you’ve been missing me and I have to same to you as well.

item.title: Part 4 Performing Vulnerability Assessments
item.description: Ever wondered what would be an effective way to find vulnerabilities within your organisational systems with ease﹖ Well in this section I will be covering vulnerability scanners for overall systems and websites which provide amazing reports within minutes!

item.title: Part 3 Exploring Active Reconnaissance Techniques
item.description: Scratching the surface of the vast world of active recon, exploring tools which provide juicy information such as nmap, metasploit, netdiscover and more.

item.title: Part 2 Reconnaissance and Footprint
item.description: Techniques to avoid traces back to identity, browsing the web to collect information on a target and social media account leaks.

item.title: Part 1 Building a Penetesting Lab
item.description: Building virtual machines, installing Kali Linux, Metasploitable 2&3, OWASP web applications and windows machines for advanced testing.
